volunteer: Volunteer at Rotaract Club de Abrantes
stageactor: Stage Actor at Grupo de Teatro Palha de Abrantes
desc1: I've been in the video game world since I was a kid, playing at a competitive level since the release of Call of Duty 2 and keeping the same passion. In addition to my taste for shooters, I played World of Warcraft since Burning Crusade where I reached the Cutting Edge achievement and also played League of Legends where I reached Diamond.
desc2: Naturally, I ended up getting interested in computing where I followed the Multimedia course in the degree and Design and Multimedia in the master's (missing the dissertation to finish the same).
desc3: At the conclusion of my academic career I ended up realizing the taste I had in being able to mold graphics/tools to my liking and decided to deepen my skills using programs like Unreal Engine to develop my own mini-game and be able to play it with my friends online.
